choices: Gordon Johnson
Melissa Dealy
1.content:
It has been said that in the year 2012, the world would end. Well, it had been said by the Mayans and rebuked by the rest of the world. How could an ancient civilization truly predict the end of the world?

Well, they weren't completely wrong. It wasn't the end of the world, per say, but the end of freedom. The end of the world as anyone knew it. And this was according to a different, more accurate prophecy that had been undiscovered, a prophecy set forth in the middle ages, when wizards, witches, and magic still existed.

The prophecy states that, in this year 2012, a powerful magical being would return in some unknown land, looking to unlock a secret that will allow this being to become all powerful, and rule the world in his image. The prophecy also stated that the only way this being could be defeated would be if two younger lads, two teenagers, were able to lead an army and save the world.

Now, the good wizards and witches of the world knew this prophecy, but they also knew the vagaries of it. Would this magical being a wizard, a witch, perhaps a demon? Would it disguise itself as a modern person, or would hide in the woods, biding its time? And where was this unknown land? Much of it was a mystery to even the most powerful beings. So they began to search for answers.

And in this search for answers, the practice of magic slowly disappeared from the world, and the stories of the magic of the middle ages became myth. And by the time 2012 began, all these Wizards would know was that this unknown land was most likely Middleview, a small American town that, for some strange reason, gave off the strongest aura of magic ever seen.

Of course, the magical being also knew of this, and had been preparing his time, almost ready to strike on the unsuspecting town. However, the final part of the prophecy, the teenage heroes and the army that could defeat him. How could this be prevented? He couldn't kill them all. That would take up too much dark magic, and even a being bent on world domination had some morals.

Ah, of course! He could use the dark magic to transform them into something other than teenagers! That could prevent the prophecy, right? Even if it would alert the other wizards and witches of his presence, they could do nothing to stop it! The prophecy says they cannot!

And so, in the year of 2012, the teenagers of the town of Middleview would become transformed, and it would take them on a magical quest to discover the conspiracy around them and stop the world from being destroyed.

Now, which of our heroes do you want to follow?
1.title: The Prophecy

choices: He turned every teenager into Dogs
He aged every teenager to middle aged
He aged every teenager to elderly
He regressed every teenager to a younger age
Another transformative spell choice
11.content:
Gordon Johnson was the president of the Middleview High School Comic Book club.

Yes, Gordon enjoyed Star Wars and Lord of the Rings, and Spider-Man and especially the tales of Arthurian legend. He was also a smart kid, who knew a ton not just about the ancient worlds and the fictional worlds but also the world that existed around him. Sure, he might have been the punching bag of many of the jocks in the school, but he didn't care. He had his group of friends and that was that.

Gordon really never realized he was a natural leader, mainly because the only time he was put in that role was in Comic Book Club. But his care for others and his intellect made him the perfect candidate for destined hero.

Gordon went to bed this fateful 2012 night, thinking the next day would be any other regular school day. But this was not to be, for across the town, the magical beings was beginning his spell...

What spell did this being cast?
11.title: Gordon Johnson

choices: Gordon wakes up as a Dog!
Gordon wakes up as human, but something feels off...
Gordon wakes up as human, and the rest of his family treats him like a dog!
111.content:
"Why transform these kids into anything human?" Thought this mysterious magical being, "Making them an animal would be much more effective! How could they stop me?"

And why not dogs? Not only would this make sense for any number of households to have dogs, but potentially, the controlling of the parents of these lovely pets would prevent the kids from even coming close to stopping this being from finding what he needs.

And so, he casts the spell, and slowly, the spell made its way throughout this entire small town.

The next morning...

That's when gordon quickly realized he had transformed into a dog but not just any dog in this case an anthromorphic superhero named universe dog but he started wondering what to do next at that very moment....

"Why not age these kids?" Thought this mysterious magical being, "If they are not teenagers, then they cannot stop me, can they?"

And why not age them to the age of their parents? Confuse them, make them gain responsibility, even make them act their new ages. This would certainly distract them long enough for the plan to go on uninterrupted.

And so, he casts the spell, and slowly, the spell made its way throughout this entire small town.

The next morning...
112.title: He aged every teenager to middle aged

The evil wizard

1122.content:
Gordon Johnson was wrong. It wasn't just a regular night, and was certainly not a regular day.

Gordon woke up, his back aching. He put his hand to his head, and felt wrinkles on it. His eyes widened. He slowly got out of his bed, and walked to the bathroom. He stared at himself in a mirror. Or better yet, herself. Gordon Johnson was now a 52 year old woman. Long, brown hair reached down to his waist. Streaks of grey and white were found in it. He had bags under his eyes, and wrinkles around his face.

"What the f-"

"Gordon, what the hell is going on!?!"

Gordon's little sister, who was 13, barged into the room. Of course, she was now 55, fat, balding, and wore thick, embarrassing glasses. For the record, she was also a man.

"I have no idea! Where's Mom and Dad?"

"I don't know! I looked in their room, they weren't there!"

"Look, maybe we should... okay, let me think."

"Gordon, we are old! I do not want to be old Gordon! And I do not want a dick!"

"Jenny, just let me think! I don't care if you're old, fat or anything! I just want to know what's going on!'" he said.

"What's going on is you being a dick! Which, in case you haven't noticed, is what I now have!"

"Shut up! Everything has a logical explanation. How is there a logical explanation?"

Suddenly, there was a flash of light.

Who, or what, has appeared?
1122.title: Gordon wakes up as a middle aged woman!

choices: Transformation
Assistance
11221.content:
The light died down. Gordon and Jenny looked up, and stared. A group of elderly men and women were there. They were clad in robes, crowns, and cliche wizard hats. They were smiling. One, the oldest, stepped forwards and spoke.

"Gordon Johnson," he began. "A terrible evil has risen again in this world. Middleveiw has been transformed. Or better yet, the teenagers. Only an army of teenagers can destroy the evil. We wish to assist you, in any way we can. The council can generate enough magic to create a small transformation, or we may leave you be, and give you any assistance you need. What do you choose? It is up to you, and only you."

What does Gordon choose?
11221.title: The good wizards

choices: Swap age, but not gender
Swap gender, but not age
112211.content:
"A transformation," he said. "Yeah."

"Very well then," said the wizard. "We can revert you back to your previous ages, but your current genders will not change. However, we could revert your genders to normal, but not your age. What will it be?"

What does Gordon choose?

1122111.content:
"Okay, if only teenagers can stop this evil, we better swap ages," said Gordon.

"Wait! I don't want to keep having a-"

"So be it," said the wizards, all in unison.

They started chanting in a language Gordon, and perhaps, anyone but the wizards, could understand. Gordon immediately noticed the changes. He stared to shrink, but barely. His arms became thinner, and the wrinkles disappeared. He was now slimmer, and no longer wearing the clothes of a middle-aged woman.

http://www.cypswansea.co.uk/media/images...

"Cool," he said.

Jenny had also become smaller, and muscular. She now had a full head of blond hair.

"This feels so weird."

"Come," said the eldest wizard, who was the only one to have stopped chanting. "It's time to meet the rest of Middleview."

They walk out of Gordon's house. A crowd of teenagers were in front of Gordon's house.

What does he do?
1122111.title: Swap age, but not gender

11221111.content:
"Um... can you handle this?" He asked the wizard.

Not waiting for an answer, Gordon ran into the crowd.

"Mark! Mark!"

He pushed past people. One girl raised her hand, jumping.

"Gordon! Right here!"

He rushed towards the girl, and faced her.

http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/3030/08...

"Woah."

"Yeah. I'm, like, not sure what to say either. At least I look good."

"Um... that's a matter of opinion."

They both laughed, crouching down. Suddenly, Gordon was tapped on the shoulder. He turned around, and saw a tall, blond, smiling boy.

http://www.colourbox.com/image/a-cheerfu...

"Melissa?" asked Gordon, who broke out int a smile.

"In the flesh. Or, in the new flesh."

"Yeah. I guess magic is involved. You know, with wizards and all. I think that I have to build an army."

"Just like in Star Trek, when- I mean, oh, an army? That's great."

"Melissa, you walked towards the cafeteria for Comic Book Club. Then you left. You can talk about Star Trek."

"Oh. Okay," she said.

"Can I interrupt?" said Mark. "But Gordon, the... wizard wants you."

Gordon got up, and walked towards his porch.

What does he say?
11221111.title: Search the crowd for his friends

choices: He vanished
He ran away
112211112.content:
"Look guys, I have no idea what's going on. But I guess that there's some evil force coming after us. Only teenagers can stop it. so just deal with your current... forms, until it's dealt with. So, let's go!"

The crowd was silent. Mark, Jenny and Melissa cheered. Suddenly, they all collapsed. Gordon soon followed. A horrendous, raspy voice filled his head.

"Gordon Johnson... you have lost. Do you call this band of children an army. I can create anything at will. My army is unlimited. You cannot win. You cannot! I have already won Gordon Johnson. Submit to me, all of you submit to me, and I shall return you to your rightful forms. I will make you more powerful than ever. You will be trained in the magical arts, and you will be all-powerful. Those of you who wish this, simply say the word."

The voice ended. The teens looked around. Ten vanished into midair. Then two more. Another followed.

"What was that?" asked Gordon.

"I'm afraid that it was the force of evil," said the wizard. "His name is-was, Azreal. He was corrupted when he discovered the ways of a long dead magic. Now he wishes to teach the world that magic, with him as ruler. If all are equal, under one ruler, there can be no war. That is how he thinks. If he success, freedom will be destroyed. But if dark magic is used to much, the world will be corrupted. All magic will be corrupted, and therefore, all science. The world as we know it will end. Only you can truly stop him. To banish him forever," the old wizard told.

"So no pressure?"

"Not at all. Go to your friends Gordon. You may not get another chance."

Gordon knew what this meant, but refused to accept it. They couldn't die. Mark wasn't going to die. Melissa wasn't going to die. Could they? He walked through the rest of the crowd, to his friends. But Mark was gone.

"Melissa, where's Mark?"

What does Melissa say?
112211112.title: He gets straight to the point

To find more teens
1122111121.content:
"He did what!? He joined the... thing? What's wrong with him?"

"Look, this is really weird. Mark just got desperate," said Melissa

"I don't care Melissa! My best friend is gone! He is evil now, he is the bad guy, and I might have to kill him!"

"Gordon, you don't have to kill him! If we can get rid of the evil, I bet that Mark will lose whatever power he has!"

"No! No, you don't-"

"What happened has happened. I will go with you. You will need guide. Let us be off!"

The wizard started walking, and Gordon, along with Melissa and the rest of the teens, followed.

Gordon jogged up to the wizard.

"So, we need an army, right?"
"Of course!" exclaimed the old wizard. "That message was sent to every teenager in the world. By my calculations, most of the world has givin up, and joined the evil, or died. Europe, Brazil, Kenya, Austrailia, and America still stand against the threat. We must recruit teens on our way to Boston."
"Boston? We're in New York."
"Then get ready for a long walk."

The wizard smiled at Gordon, who was not pleased.

"Where's our first stop?"
"New York City. There is no doubt about it, there will be resistance from Azreal. Using teens to fight teens. Clever."

11412.content:
Gordon woke up to a sight he was unfamiliar with. He expected to see the ceiling or the wall. Instead, he saw the inner lining of his shirt. He also noticed that it seemed a lot bigger than before. He slowly crawled out of his clothing and out from underneath his covers. Gordon looked around and saw that everything was much bigger than before. He wanted to get down from his bed, but he looked down and saw that the distance between his bed and the floor had increased.

"Have I shrunk?" He tried to say, but it came out as baby babble.

Stunned by his new voice, he covered his mouth quickly.He carefully crawled down onto the floor, however, he slipped and feel on his bottom. His newly returned infantile instincts caused to to begin crying uncontrollably.

Hearing his cry, ____ came into his room.

1143.content:
Gordon tossed and turned as he fought his way through the shadows and demons which plagued the young man's dreams. He cried out like one who's been startled and woke up to his pitch black room. There were no monsters out to get him, nor demons to torment him... or so he thought.
---
Deep beneath the earth, a dark and evil creature brooded upon his throne, his magic scepter in his hand and his familiar raven perched upon his shoulder. The green orb atop his staff caught the patches of light from above and lit the room just enough that if one were to look carefully they would see strange and grotesque figures writhing about in the shadows. The Being, for so he is called by those who rightly fear his true name, rose and spoke in a dark and terrible voice, "Yes, that seems like a lovely idea! Don't you agree Molinus?" The raven squawked in response, "Good boy."
He stopped and glared at one of the writhing creatures which had given him a funny look, "What are you gawking at?" it quickly looked away and went back to its writhing.
The Being rose from his throne as he raised his great staff and cried to his masters below, "Brengtus carvinach durentun! Juventak Korotak!"
---
Gordon stumbled into the bathroom, his stomach in extreme pain. He gripped the edge of the sink and started coughing uncontrollably. His hands, covered in sweat, slipped from the sink and he fell to the floor... A few hours later he came around again and staggered up again as best he could. He looked the mirror and everything was perfectly normal.
---
"Heaven's Love Magitech services, this is Calinus, how may I help you?"
"Heaven?"
"Outsourcing's a bitch ain't it! Any way, how can I help you?"
"Yes, well, Im just your evil lord of darkness, and I found out not too long ago that theres this prophecy that says two teenagers will lead an army against me, you know the drill. And there from a specific town so I got the idea to turn all the teenagers into small children."
"Okay, that must take up a lot of dark energy. How much did you spend?"
"About thirty-eight percent."
"Ah now that could have been avoided if you had the new Psych-Gnom 12."
"Well, I just want to know how to-"
"Let me explain, we put a series of psychic gnomes into your staff and they sense when a spell isn't going to work and preserve the dark energy for later that would otherwise go to waste."
"The great, but in the meantime-"
"And for just thirteen easy payments of 6 souls a month you'll get not only this but a-"
"Look, just tell me how to fix this!"
"Did you check the battery?"
"This thing has batteries?"
---
Gordon enjoyed a nice bowl of corn flakes after his ordeal which went down surprisingly easy considering how he felt this morning. All except that last bite when some of his teeth fell out of his mouth. He had barely gotten over the shock when he felt a tugging at all of his bones and heard his shoes clunk to the floor as they fell off his diminished feet followed by his snake like socks. Soon more of his teeth fell out as his throat jumbled and moved around, locking off his deeper bass and leaving him with the high soprano of a young and helpless boy. He looked down in shock and horror at his now smooth and hairless legs, wearing his boxers like a pair of oversized shorts. This is impossible, he thought, it just isn't possible!
Alas, it was possible, not only for him, but for every single teenager in town. The boy, almost a man, now a boy once more was short and small and was forced to accept that he was nothing but a child of...

115312.content: A black cloaked man in a hood held up a staff with a black stone on it. A cloud of black magical energy came out of the staff and expanded over the entire town. Out of each of the houses, all males and women over the age of twenty were walking out of their houses and towards the man in the black cloak. Teenage and small girls were tugging back on their respective relatives, trying to stop them from going. The black cloaked man smiled as he watched his army of mind controlled minions coming to join him. His smile grew wider as he saw a woman with a staff walking towards him. It seemed that he had finally captured his nemesis and she would now be his minion. A little girl was tugging at the woman's robe, trying to get her to stop walking towards him. He regarded the girl. He had not known that his nemesis had an apprentice. He quickly pointed his staff at his nemesis. She turned, and threw her pupil off her. Desperation settled in. The girl closed her eyes and started to light up. The light expanded in a sphere around her, pushing back the darkness. The males under 20 started to change, becoming shorter, their hair growing longer, their chests expanding. As they changed, his spell seemed to lose its effect on them. The little girl that had cast the spell collapsed to the ground, exhausted from the large amount of magical energy that she had expelled. The man cursed himself for not seeing this coming. Still, it did not matter. He now had a powerful sorceress under his command as well as an army of mind controlled minions. It was time to leave before any mages sensed the large magical energy release in the area. The dark wizard turned, leading his army away from the town, his mind-controlled sorceress at his side.
115312.title: Normal

choices: Find Melissa
See if the little girl is all right
1153121.content: You wake up groggy. It felt as if you had been hit on the head by something large and blunt. You stand up slowly, holding your head, and find no headache. You stop halfway to your feet, your hand moving to your hair. You don't remember it being this long. Come to think of it, your whole body feels weird. There is some sort of weight on your chest and your trousers don't seem to fit right. You have one knee up now, an action that would normally have crushed your penis, but you felt nothing. Feeling 'down there' you realize the gravity of the situation. You stand up the rest of the way and look yourself up and down. Your suspicions were confirmed. You had become a girl. Now that you had confirmed your suspicions, you examined your surroundings. The town looked normal, except for the fact that every single person in the town was unconscious. And there were no longer any boys in the town at all. The only person that was still awake was a little girl, who was sitting on the ground and crying. What do you do now?
1153121.title: Waking up

choices: Follow you, waking up all the teenagers in the town
Follow Lilith, contacting the Council of Mages
11531212.content:
"Are you all right little girl?" you asked, walking over and sitting down next to her.
"Y-yes," she said, trying to wipe her tears "What happened to everyone, I released a lot of magic to try to protect people from the evil sorcerer, but I'm not sure how the magic affected people."
"I do," you say "I used to be male."
"Oh," said the girl, then panic came across her face and she scrambled away from you in fear of what you might do to her "I'm sorry, I'm so sorry, I never meant to hurt anyone."
"Hey, hey, hey," you say, walking over to where she was cowering and putting your arm around her "It's all right, I don't blame you for what you did, you were only trying to help, now why don't we go and wake everyone else up and then we can try to fix this."
The little girl nodded. You stood up, having to steady yourself for a minute because of your new center of gravity, then helped the little girl to her feet.
"What's your name?" you asked her.
"Lilith," she replied "Lilith Paltrow, a Sorceress's apprentice, my mistress has been taken, I want to rescue her, but I can't do it alone."
"I will help you, Lilith Paltrow," you say "In return, I hope you will return me to my male form after this is over, for now though, if the evil sorcerer's magic does not work on female teenagers, it might be better if I stay female for now."
"Good decision," said Lilith "I'm afraid I couldn't have turned you back if I'd wanted to, that spell I cast was raw magic, the most powerful thing in the universe, something that that evil sorcerer wouldn't be able to counter, I don't know how I tailored it only to affect people under 20, and I don't know how to change you back, so you are stuck as teen girls with the potential to learn magic."
"Wait, what?" you say
"Because of the large amount of raw magic released in the area, everyone in this area is now capable of learning magic because of that exposure, but only those affected by the spell," explained Lilith "Go and wake everyone up, I need to inform the Council of Mages."
11531212.title: See if the little girl is all right

choices: You tell the others, they gather weapons and leave
The Council of Mages representatives arrive first and attack all of you
115312121.content:
As you walked through the town, you saw that many of the actual girls were up already and working on reviving the former boys. Some were looking at their bodies in confusion and feeling in different places, much as you had when you had come round. You continued to wake up each of the girls, listen to them scream for a few minutes, then tell them to calm down and that everything would be O.K, and send them to one of the actual girls to help them adjust. Once all of the girls were awakened and somewhat adjusted, with many being given extra clothes from the actual girls, you went back to talk to Lilith.
"Did you contact the council yet, Lilith?" you asked
"Yes," said Lilith, seeming distracted "They want to send a team of sorcerers to kill everyone in this town."
"What?" you asked "Why?"
"Is it really important now why they want to kill you all?" asked Lilith, sounding impatient "The point is, we have to get out of here before they arrive."
"All right," you say "Let's go get the others and get out of here."
Lilith nodded and both of you left the building and ran to tell the others.

Follow Lilith, training the people of the town in magic/ follow u, magic lessons
115312122.content:
Lilith walked back into the house where her mistress and her had lived. It looked so empty now that her mistress had gone. Lilith wiped away another tear. This was no time for crying, she had a job to do. She found her mistress's large spell book and started to look through it for the contact spells. Like all young mages, Lilith had been taught to read from a young age in all languages, so that she could read spells written by witches in other countries as well as her own. She finally found the spell she was looking for.

"Council of Mages, I am Lilith Paltrow, Apprentice of Mage Janine, I seek an audience with you on an issue of huge importance," Lilith waited for a moment, and then six lights appeared in the room, each one a different color: red, yellow, green, blue, black and white. These lights were representative of each of the six elemental mages. Red for fire, yellow for air, green for earth, blue for water, black for darkness and white for air, each of the lights would allow Lilith to communicate with one member of the council. Her voice would be heard by all of them no matter where they were.
"Why have you called us, Lilith Paltrow?" asked Fire Mage Heatron "We told Mage Janine only to use this spell in case of an emergency."
"This is an emergency," said Lilith "An evil sorcerer that we've had some trouble with before has come and used a spell to take over the minds of everyone in the town except for the women under twenty, I released a lot of raw magic which turned all of the males under twenty into girls, which stopped the spell on them."
"This is troubling," said Dark Mage Drokon "I will find out who in my order has gone rogue, then I will return to this council."
The dark light vanished.
"There still remains the problem of the spell you cast," said Fire Mage Heatron "I assume they have the potential to learn magic now?"
"Yes," said Lilith "That was the second reason I called this council, I need permission to train them in magic so we can go up against the evil mage that is took control of everyone in this town, including my mistress."
"How much did Mage Janine teach you?" asked Fire Mage Heatron.
"She taught me how to control all of the different forms of magic, I wanted to have a diverse range of skills when I become a mage like her," explained Lilith "I have managed to master all of these forms of magic."
"Very well," said Fire Mage Heatron "You have a week, after that, we will have to mobilize a force against the evil mage that started this, we can't let any mages rebel, or they might start a magic civil war."
"I will not fail," said Lilith "We will be ready in a week, ready your army, we may need it."
115312122.title: Follow Lilith, contacting the Council of Mages

You

11531212221.content:
Lilith looked at the guys that had changed gender. The actual girls in the area had been unaffected by the spell, so Lilith had sent them off to find weapons and train with them. They needed an army, these people were the only ones that were unaffected by the dark sorcerer's mind control spell. Lilith couldn't trust anyone except the council. But even the council would be affected by the spell if they were attacked by the sorcerer, so Lilith couldn't even count on their help. Lilith's thinking was interrupted as she had to dodge a fireball from Gordon.
"Good," she said "The basic fireball takes the least energy to cast, you can cast this spell repeatedly at the enemy, this is good if you want to force an enemy back, but in order to gain that advantage, you need a distraction."
Lilith jumped, bringing her hand down onto the ground, causing the ground to vibrate. All of the former boys had trouble staying on their feet. Lilith took the opportunity to throw a fireball at each of them, knocking them all to the ground.
"That's the basic knockdown combination," said Lilith "You can also manipulate the air around you in order to fly, but this takes a lot of energy, which is why we magi use enchanted items -brooms, flying carpets and the like- to fly, although we can fly without them."
Lilith demonstrated by floating into the air. Several of the others joined her, one of which was Gordon.
"Air can also be used to your advantage in combat," said Lilith, putting both of her hands together, she created a funnel of air which spun all the former boys around and around in the air "On the ground, the air can be used to slow down enemies."
"There are two more elements I have to teach you," said Lilith "Water and light."
She landed back on the ground. The rest of the former boys joined her.
"Water is everywhere around us, the air is full of evaporated water from the water cycle, you just need to harness it, change its state from gas to liquid, or ice if it suits your purpose," said Lilith, holding out a cup and demonstrating water pouring out of thin air, then turning to ice.
"Light is your final element, it includes summoning lightning, blinding the enemy and, when you're a master, removing mind control," explained Lilith
"So if we go up against our own parents," said Gordon "How do we remove the mind control?"
"The dark sorcerer is the original caster of the spell, if we can destroy his staff, all spells cast with it will be reversed," said Lilith "Apart from that, I don't have another way to reverse the mind control."

12.content:
Melissa Dealy was the captain of the Middleview High School Cheerleading Team. And she was also a closet Nerd

Yes, Melissa enjoyed Star Trek, and Discworld, and Batman, and tons and tons of other geekly things. However, being a blonde cheerleader stereotype, it put her into a certain social group. While Melissa never participated in the taunting that her fellow cheerleaders would do, she never stopped it. As Captain, she wanted to keep the peace. She took herself out in order to help the greater good of her team.

This made Melissa a caring person who gave her own soul for the happiness of others. This made her perfect destined hero, though one with a little more growing to do.

Melissa went to bed this fateful 2012 night, thinking the next day would be any other regular school day. But this was not to be, for across the town, the magical beings was beginning his spell...

What spell did this being cast?

1243.content:
Slowly the spell worked its way though every house in town, finding any teen and regressing them in body and mind as they slept.

*********That morning***********

Finally it was morning, the sun barely shone into Melissa’s room but just enough to irritate her slumber enough to make her roll over in her bed. Then as if on cue her alarm went off forcing her to wake up to turn it off.

One thing that Melissa knew from years of experience was that she was not a morning person, she was able to get ready for school mainly out of ritually doing it everyday. But for the most part her body was on auto pilot through out the entire process. That being said as she laid in bed she could tell something was off. She couldn't put her finger on it right now but her room just felt different to her.

Deciding it was just morning grogginess messing with her she began getting out of bed. That is when she heard a distinct crinkle from under her covers as she moved. This immediately brought her out of her grogginess. Never had she heard a crinkle when she was getting up in the morning, was she right about something being off this morning? she wondered.

Worried the sound was real and not just in her head she shifted in her bed again hearing the crinkle once more. Carefully she lifted her covers and looked down. To her horror she was wrapped in a big disposable diaper. She poked it a couple time to make sure she wasn't still dreaming. As she touched it it dawned on her that it was real.

Quickly she decided to change out of it before someone came into her room to check on her or something. She ran to her dresser and opened her underwear drawer only to see where her panties used to be now sat disposable diapers.

“What on earth is going on?” She said to herself

her mind seemed to be having trouble processing what was going on this early in the morning.

Slowly she walked over to her closet and opened it only to discover....

info.brief_description: An epic quest to save the world begins when all the teens of a town transform overnight!
info.description:
A prophecy is about to come true. A magical being is about to transform the teenagers of the entire town of Middleview in order to heighten his chances of finding the mysterious magical energy that gives anyone who finds it the power to rule the world.

Two teenagers are destined to lead an army against this being and to save the world in the process. But can they do it transformed as something else? What secrets of the magical world will be discovered on their journey? Will they find love and friendship? And will they save the world? Only you decide!

General Rules:
- Killing can only come late in the game, and has to be earned. If I feel the death is unjustified, I will delete the chapter.
- Sex is not allowed
- Keep any weight gain transformations within the weight gain plot line.
- Swearing is allowed
- Have Fun!
